titles.title: Recognizing the life and legacy of Richard (Dick) Gregory and honoring his contributions to the civil rights movement and to American comedy.
Recognizing the life and legacy of Richard (Dick) Gregory and honoring his contributions to the civil rights movement and to American comedy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: Honors the life and legacy of Richard (Dick) Gregory, and acknowledges his contributions to civil rights and to American comedy.
